title: Riot, what if Star Guardian Lux looked like this? * /r/leagueoflegends

embed.description: Hey reddit. So I love the new Lux but I'm not crazy in love about the hair, so I thought it could use some changes. I don't mind it being pink but...

body:
I was looking for lux's new skin, Star Guardian Lux and i found a guys who showed an **AMAZING **way for lux skin!
Honestly I like her more this way than the Riots version, but anyways is still an amazing skin for lux... She really needed it.
There are even for every kinds of tastes, Long ponytail, short twin tails, colors etc **Amazing i say**
{{champion:99}} says thank you :D 

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/34cbaj/riot_what_if_star_guardian_lux_looked_like_this/

replies.body: i dont like the pink hair from this Skin. The blond hair color is much better for this skin ( picture: POhipGN.png)
And they still can make a tribute to Sailor Moon, whit the twin tails and blonde, just like Usagi ^^
Pink hair doesnt fit to lux! Better take the Blonde one! It looks much better :) if its blonde i would defenitly buy it! Awesome skin guys
This soooo much better, i would buy it :D
why not just sell the hair as a chroma pack bundle for that Skin? that would be so awesome °-°
